reviewText: It was a Christmas present for my husband... I couldn't give it more stars because he/we haven't watched it yet. But I'm sure he will love it. He's a Ford man so. :) The delivery was fast..
A GREAT REVIEW OF FORD CARS.

Well done documentary on the nostalgic and historic history of the '50's era FORD MOTOR COMPANY products.
 Lots of great vintage cars and memories.
YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!

Got this for my dad - a long time Ford addict.  From the '51 Ford until he went "German" - everything in between was a Ford.  There was a Fairlane/a station wagon/a fast 4-on-the-floor one & more I can't remember.  Note:  if you had kids in the '50s - you had a station wagon.  Myself - I went from French to British to Fords (Mercurys actually).  Been driving Mercury Cougars since '85.  Ford makes a damn fine car.  Had the 1st Cougar for 20 yrs before I sold it.  My '94 turned 20 this yr - passed it's smog test w/flying colors & is still purring like a kitten.  Ford makes a damn fine car...
